description: Complete system overview documenting the booth rent management system architecture, component relationships, and high-level workflows
Detailed documentation of the dual rent calculation algorithms (fixed vs percentage-based), including formulas, edge cases, and real-time preview calculations
Comprehensive documentation of the multi-payment method processing flows, validation rules, and status handling for ACH, credit card, and PayPal transactions
Documentation of transaction status workflows, state transitions, status propagation rules, and reconciliation logic between payments and booth rent records
Core data models and relationships between transactions, booth rentals, stylists, payments, and status tracking entities
